Text: COH for Cc CES purchased dth to n for k was now thanks joann

RE STOI Overinjection for June thArmentrout wTCO gas control approved an additional overinjection for For a total net dth into storage thanks joann Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM Enron North America Corp From Joann Collins AM To Dick CT Chris CT Joan NRON Robert CT Scott NRON Victor CT cc Subject STOI Overinjection for June th Bill Armentrout wTCO gas control approved overinjection for Total net dth into storage thanks joann

Re Allocation of June Deal at COHthe only difference is the volume is dthdaily Chris CT PM To Joann NRON cc Joan NRON Robert CT Victor CT Molly CT Subject Re Allocation of June Deal at COH If Im reading this correctly this is for the CES sale to Metro Media I entered a sale in the system for a volume of dthday deal The price is IF CGAS Variable Cost demand if we use ENA transport Charlie and I can chat about the transport after bid week Molly CES will not include these volumes on the FOM sheet I added a worksheet in the CES transport file for these volumes Please forward this on to anyone else that needs to see it and as always dont hesitate to call if you have questions From Joann Collins ENRON PM To Chris CT cc Subject Allocation of June Deal at COH Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on PM on PM To cc Porter Jeffrey Dalphon Charles Kinney Doug Subject Allocation of June Deal at COH Joann Here is the distribution of the CES EU deal that Chris did with Charlie last week The original deal volume was for dthmonth Doug could you please ask Chris if he will keep us whole on the contracted price for the extra dth Joann pls call me if you have trouble reading this Please note that the volumes to are for TIMET only k Thanks Kara MARKET Enron Request AREA DTH PER MONTH DTH PER DAY TOTAL

Allocation of June Deal at COHForwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on PM on PM To cc Porter Jeffrey Dalphon Charles Kinney Doug Subject Allocation of June Deal at COH Joann Here is the distribution of the CES EU deal that Chris did with Charlie last week The original deal volume was for dthmonth Doug could you please ask Chris if he will keep us whole on the contracted price for the extra dth Joann pls call me if you have trouble reading this Please note that the volumes to are for TIMET only k Thanks Kara MARKET Enron Request AREA DTH PER MONTH DTH PER DAY TOTAL

Re STOI Overinjection for May st and EOM Cc Mike Ng wTCO has approved an additional overinjection for the EOM which total for May is For the daily total injection is dth overinjection thanks joann Chris CT AM To Joan NRON Robert CT Joann NRON Dick CT Alicia CT David CT cc Scott NRON Victor CT Subject Re STOI Overinjection for May st and EOM In Sitara I am showing an over injection for May st of dth and I am showing the withdrawal in June Joan NRON AM To Joann NRON cc Chris CT Dick CT Katherine L CT Victor CT Robert CT Subject Re STOI Overinjection for May st and EOM To ensure everyone is on the same page over Mays MMIQ was already approved and in TCOs gas control records to additional was approved on Thursday May with Steve Stonestreet Julie Watkins and Brian Adams verbally on the phone Enron should have a total of on gas controls books over Mays MMIQ Joann needs a total of to overinject for the month Per my conversation with Mike Ng he will ask for the incremental for a total of Mike will let us know if the incremental has been approved Joann also needs the for May st for a daily overinjection which has already been approved by Don Belcher at TCO JulieSteve please pass this note to Mike I dont have his email address Thank you for your help Enron North America Corp From Joann Collins AM To Chris CT Dick CT Joan NRON cc Katherine L CT Victor CT Subject STOI Overinjection for May st and EOM Chris Mike Ng wTCO has approved the EOM overinjection into storage of according to gas control they had already approved for May Also Don Becher wgas control has approved for tomorrow a overinjection of Total net dth thanks joann Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM Enron North America Corp From Joann Collins AM To Chris CT Dick CT cc Joan NRON Robert CT Katherine L CT Victor CT Subject STOI Overinjection for May th Humphreys wTCO gas control approved overinjection for Total net dth into storage thanks joann Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM Chris CT AM To Alicia CT Dick CT cc David CT Crystal CT Joan NRON Joann NRON Robert CT Scott NRON Subject CGAS Storage I made some big changes to the CGAS storage deals no changes on this ticket and Over the day weekend we are over injecting dth We will show this volume coming out in June I also made about a dth change to the volumes coming out in August I am still showing most of the withdrawal of the ENA balance in August Let me know if you have any questions

STOI Overinjection for May st and EOM Cc Mike Ng wTCO has approved the EOM overinjection into storage of according to gas control they had already approved for May Also Don Becher wgas control has approved for tomorrow a overinjection of Total net dth thanks joann Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM Enron North America Corp From Joann Collins AM To Chris CT Dick CT cc Joan NRON Robert CT Katherine L CT Victor CT Subject STOI Overinjection for May th Humphreys wTCO gas control approved overinjection for Total net dth into storage thanks joann Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM Chris CT AM To Alicia CT Dick CT cc David CT Crystal CT Joan NRON Joann NRON Robert CT Scott NRON Subject CGAS Storage I made some big changes to the CGAS storage deals no changes on this ticket and Over the day weekend we are over injecting dth We will show this volume coming out in June I also made about a dth change to the volumes coming out in August I am still showing most of the withdrawal of the ENA balance in August Let me know if you have any questions

Re STOI Overinjection Spreadsheet Cc changed your speadsheet a little thanks joann Joan Veselack AM To Joann NRON Robert CT cc Chris CT Subject STOI Overinjection Spreadsheet Decided to formalize this process Attached is a very simple spreadsheet that the TCO team can use to document Gas Controls approval for overinjections You are welcome to modify it Its purpose is to keep track of who requested who approved and volumes for overinjections Thanks

CSthe volume of dth on k to CGV is being cut because of capacity allocation at mkt you do not have any primary contracts to that area Please call Chris Germany for more information thanks joann
RICHMOND to Hopewellare we getting the dth capacity for leach to Richmond for May joann
Estimates for May Cc please update the volumes for by April tuesday pm thanks joann

Re CPA Cc now thanks joann on AM To cc Kinney Doug Subject CPA Howdy Folks Hey Joann Can you please decrease my nomination to CPA starting I am looking to decrease my CES endusers volume by dthday from to in Op Mkt I am not interested in sending it elsewhere so it will have to be a sell back This will appear in Doug Kinneys next spreadsheet Please just let me know which contracts to decrease THANKS

Conectiv Intraday k was now tks Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on PM on AM To cc Subject Conectiv Intraday Hi How much gas can you get me at BGE today Conectiv wants dth extra THANKS Forwarded by Kara DestephanisCESColumbiaGas on PM on AM Please respond to To Kara OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject RE Intraday Yep You were going to be short yesterday so I shorted my customers and gave it to CES now I need it back and need to cover my neg position Thanks Original Message From mailto Sent Friday April AM To Subject Re Intraday you mean extra right on AM Please respond to To Kara OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Intraday Can you come up with intraday at BGE for today

Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Cc have pathed this ticket in unify Sandra CT PM To Chris CT cc Robert CT Joann NRON Dick CT Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Please let me know when completed Customer is waiting patiently for payment Thanks Sandra x Chris Germany PM To Robert CT Joann NRON cc Dick CT Sandra CT Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Since we now feel certain ENA bought this gas on Jan st please path the supply deal from COH deal to one of those large CES deal tickets Im still checking the tapes to see if we can recoup the cost from CES Joanne to the best of your recollection this gas did go to CES correct Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on PM Sandra Dial AM To Chris CT cc Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Chris Status on this Thanks S Chris Germany AM To Dick CT cc Sandra CT Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Dick I dont have this deal in my records as a sale to CES When you get back lets look at your deal sheet and see if there are any notes Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on AM Sandra Dial AM To Chris CT cc Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Can you check with Dick Jenkins on this please He was my contact on this Thanks man Chris Germany PM To Sandra CT Victor CT Robert CT cc Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan I spoke with Brian at CES He does not show this deal in his records I dont show it in my records either Sandra Dial AM To Chris CT cc Victor CT Robert CT Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Yes I have an invoice Ill bring to you this pm I was out yesterday S Chris Germany AM To Sandra CT cc Victor CT Robert CT Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Do we have an invoice from CGAS of Ohio I would like to see it if we do I dont show any record of a deal like this Im going to send an email to my CES contact to see if he shows anything in his notes about this Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on AM Robert Allwein AM To Victor CT cc Sandra CT Chris CT Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Sandra I just have to get with Chris Germany to see if he can confirm this deal I will keep you posted Thanks Rob Chris Deal Please take a look at this and see if you can confirm that this was BuySell or incremental CES or EES I have a supply but no market Thanks Victor Lamadrid PM To Sandra CT cc Robert CT Chris CT Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Most likely this is an offset to our term sale to CES on CGAS Chris prepares CES invoices I dont know if he is aware of this Most likely there is an offsetting sale that is not in or we need to back off an existing path and replace with this purchase Sandra Dial PM To Stephanie CT cc Robert CT Mark CT Victor CT Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan Stephanie Can you change the year from to on the deal please Columbia Gas of Ohio sitara purchase Mark If you happen to have any info on who Enron sold the gas to since were buying from Col Gas of OH let Robert knowmeanwhile hes checking with Robin and Chris on his end so he can path it Victhis is only FYI Roberts taking the lead on finding out the info he needs to get this pathed in the system Thanks all Sandra x Forwarded by Sandra DialHOUECT on PM Robert Allwein AM To Sandra CT cc Subject Re Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan The deal ticket has on it not Can you find out who they sold the gas to Do you need this pathed and tracked and balanced Rob Sandra Dial AM To Robert CT Victor CT cc Subject Columbia Gas of Ohio on CGAS for Jan RobertVictor Can one of you check into this for me please you may also be getting a call from Mark Feldman from Volume Columbia Gas of Ohio sitara flow date mms The deal is in sitara however I do not see anything nommed etc in Unify like the deal doesnt exist Can you check on your end to see if there was some sort of glitcherror According to Dick Jenkins he agrees with the counterparty Let me know what you findfix so I can redraft and pay them Could it be booked under another pipe Call me later Thanks S x
NEEDS FOR Cc your estimate needs for by March pm est Thank You Joann

Re TCO capacity available Cc CES was short at the following Market Area Op Mkt thanks joann Scott Goodell AM To Dick CT Chris CT Robin CT Sarah CT Scott CT Robert CT Joann NRON Joan NRON cc Subject TCO capacity available Attached is a list of Columbia Gas capacity that posted on the EBB All bids are due at am Let me know what you see value in and what our game plan is If ENA doesnt want it should we mention it to CES Robert Joann and Joni was CES short this winter at any of these points Scott

Re COH Decrease Cc was now fyi CES is buying back dth for days thanks joann on AM To cc Subject Re COH Decrease buy back on AM Please respond to To Kara OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re COH Decrease where do you want this gas to go per management you have to redirect or buy back on AM To cc Subject COH Decrease Joann In addition to the dthday redirect Kim requested please decrease the nomination to COH by dthday for March th st Should be coming off K Thanks Kara

Re CMD Cc forwarded this email to Chris Germany and he will talk to Brian on AM To cc Subject CMD I need an additional dth for the month meter If we start it on the th it divides evenly your choice Please let me know k when it is available

Cut Gas Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on PM on PM To cc Perrone Brian Bartlo Noel Subject Cut Gas I just found out through COH reports that dth delivered to mkt via K First Energy did not show up on the th of January As a result of this and other factors a total delivery volume to that agg pool went from the dth requested amount to dth This was during the OFO period Not sure how we are going to handle the resulting penalties but just wanted to make sure that Enron does not pay First Energy for those volumes Sorry I was not notified of this cut sooner Please let me know if s Kara

COH Redirect Addl GasCES is requesting dth for the ROM at coh are you aware of this Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM on AM To cc Bartlo Noel Perrone Brian Subject COH Redirect Addl Gas Joann Please redirect the following from mkt cut dth total off K please prorate thru ROM take to from mkt cut dth total off K please prorate thru ROM take to In addition to the redirects I am also requesting more gas delivered to from you dth total if you could please prorate that through the rest of the month as well We can start this on the th if that works for you Thank you Kara

Sjersey for Cc January for a couple of weekends SJersey tried to do intradays Due to the interconnect and other supply we were not able to change their nominations South Jersey have always been told that changing nomination on the weekend would be on best available Julie Punches from Sjersey due to her changes on the weekend is over at some of her CDC markets is asking to allocate the excess gas to CES agg pools Would this be something Enron would do
Monclova a cut dth from Monclova f to Sjersey Resources the penalty for this is about per dth Just Fyi thank joann

Re Meter K Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on PM Chris CT PM To cc Joann NRON Subject Re Meter We are trying to schedule this gas for today Joann you are getting dts from Reyna off ANR I created a sale to CES deal at a price of Brian I made need to adjust this price It wont be much of an adjustment and we can talk about that later Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on PM From Joann Collins ENRON AM To Chris CT cc ECT Victor CT Subject Re Meter yes with interconnect gas paulding Chris CT AM To cc Victor CT Joann NRON Subject Meter Per my discussion with Joann it looks like we have covered this dth at meter on CGAS
Re Meter Cc interconnect gas paulding Chris CT AM To cc Victor CT Joann NRON Subject Meter Per my discussion with Joann it looks like we have covered this dth at meter on CGAS

Suburban increasei think this is the deal you were asking about in order for this to flow i would need Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on PM on AM To Joann NRON cc Subject Suburban increase Effective we need to increase Suburban dth per day I will now need a total of dth per day Please advise of a contract number when it is available Thanks

Re CKY and Cc increased the dth to dth for i will forward this email to Chris Germany and let him discuss the price with Brian is that OK with you k was now Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM on AM To Joann NRON cc Perrone Brian Subject Re CKY and There is a later one also than came back undeliverable and I resent which I will forward And also per Brian we needed it through the end of month also It does get confusing There are numbers flying around from everywhere I guess there is nothing you can do today I really need this through the end of month There are huge penalties involved here on AM Please respond to To Marianne OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re CKY and Marianne here is the email you sent that said only for th Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM Embedded Enron North America Corp image moved to file From Joann Collins picpcx AM To cc Subject Re CKY and Document link Joann Collins K on AM To Joann NRON cc Swogger Joanne Perrone Brian Subject CKY and Just talked to Brian I need the additional dth for the above two days going to CKY Please let me know the contract number picpcx

Feb are your contracts for fyi SJersey volumes are estimates ONLY Thx Joann Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on PM Enron North America Corp From Joann Collins PM To Chris CT Victor CT Katherine L CT Robert CT Joan NRON cc Subject Feb As everyone already knows weEnron does not have a shared drive for the Dailyest So if everyone could update the sheet with their own volumes and email me back i will consolidate it to Thanks Please have your est volumes by pm Jan Tuesday

CKY Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM on AM To Joann NRON cc Swogger Joanne Perrone Brian Subject CKY I am requesting an additional dth per day starting today going to the above referenced ldc Please let me know the k as soon as possible Thanks

Re Xtra Gas bought COHi cannot find this dealticket in Sitarawhich means i cannot path Please look at the highlighted red below thanks joann Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on PM Enron North America Corp From Joann Collins AM To cc Subject Re Xtra Gas bought COH FOR ONLY K NOW on AM To Joann NRON cc Subject Re Xtra Gas bought COH Thats when the deal was done apparently I dont care when I get the gas as long as its before the months over I guess you didnt know about it on AM Please respond to To Kara OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re Xtra Gas bought COH the date is on AM To Joann NRON cc Subject Xtra Gas bought COH On Brian Perrone bought dth from Chris Germany at COH at Please let me know whenhow you would like to deliver this gas Thank you Joann

Feb everyone already knows weEnron does not have a shared drive for the Dailyest So if everyone could update the sheet with their own volumes and email me back i will consolidate it to Thanks Please have your est volumes by pm Jan Tuesday

Gas increaseth we have sold the extra capacity to Amoco and BGE Citygate I sent earlier this morning a email concerning price Please let me know about the th to BGE Forwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM on AM To Destephanis Kara Joann NRON cc Subject Gas increase JoAnn Due to the OFO on the BGE system until Friday I will need incremental gas in the amount of dth per day for gas day Wednesday Thursday and Friday a delivered volume of dth each day for a total delivered volume of dth Kara if BGE requests call for a reduction for residential customers due to requirements please do not reduce any gas delivered We can use this in addition to the dthalso to service our end user customers Just let the gas flow Please let me know what K you will deliver this on If you have any questions please give me a call Thank You Fred

BGE OFOForwarded by Joann CollinsCorpEnron on AM on AM To Joann NRON Rose Maggie Lombardo Fred cc Stiles Marianne Subject BGE OFO The restrictions at BGE will continue today the th The posting said it might last until Friday Like yesterday Fred will be determining how much extra needs to be bought and delivered intraday I will work with Enron to buy the gas and get the contract number in order to nom the supply and the customer allocations If the customer burns more than over what we have allocated to them they will be buying gas at the Production Rate Please let me know if you have any questions Thank you Kara
